name: Bouncy Bools
description: This is a game I made in 24 hours. Its just a prototype so don't expect anything. Game doesn't have graphics , sound , music and I'm gonna add a lot of gameplay aspects if I get positive feedback. The game is a mobile casual platformer game. Don't forget to leave your feedback. So I can understand if its a good game design or a bad one because I can't see the quality of my own products. Thank you.
